data.comment: The big names in today's match at Inter Miami CF Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match has been interrupted.
Today's referee, Drew Fischer, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Houston.
Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 4, Throw-in Miami.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 7, Miami to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
Important block from the Houston defence as Lewis Morgan fires in a strike for Miami.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Miami.
Miami drive upfield and Wil Trapp gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Houston defender.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Miami in the half of Houston.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Houston.
In the minute 13, Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miami's Gonzalo Higuain breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Drew Fischer awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Houston push upfield but Drew Fischer quickly pulls them for offside.
Miami's Matias Pellegrini misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 16, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
Miami have a goal kick.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Memo Rodriguez (Houston) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 22, Houston have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Miami pushes forward through Lewis Morgan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 24, Miami's Matias Pellegrini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Houston defender.
Throw-in for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 28, Miami have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Gonzalo Higuain for Miami drives towards goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 29, Darwin Ceren (Houston) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Houston.
Drew Fischer signals a Houston throw-in in Miami's half.
In the minute 34, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Darwin Quintero is booked for the away team.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 39, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gonzalo Higuain gets his shot on target but fails to score for Miami.
Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
In the minute 41, Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Houston.
Kiki Struna for Houston gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Miami have a goal kick.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Drew Fischer awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Memo Rodriguez (Houston) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Houston in Fort Lauderdale.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fort Lauderdale.
Throw-in for Houston close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Houston, close to Miami's area.
The first half has been concluded at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Houston kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Houston in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale Houston attack through Memo Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 48, Free kick Houston.
Darwin Quintero of Houston gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 50, Can Houston get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
Free kick for Houston in the half of Miami.
Miami needs to be cautious. Houston have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Miami's Gonzalo Higuain gets in a shot on goal at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 54, Miami to take a throw-in in Houston territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gonzalo Higuain for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Houston goal kick.
Miami have been awarded a penalty...
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 57, Goal! Miami take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Lewis Morgan spot-kick..
Throw-in Houston.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Houston.
Miami are pushing forward but Lewis Morgan's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 63, Free kick Houston.
In Fort Lauderdale Miami's Gonzalo Higuain is caught offside.
Corner awarded to Houston.
In the minute 64, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Houston in the half of Miami.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Miami.
Matias Pellegrini (Miami) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Drew Fischer signals a Miami throw-in in Houston's half.
Throw-in for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Houston.
In the minute 67, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Miami.
Miami's Gonzalo Higuain attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Drew Fischer awards Houston a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Miami.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Houston's half?
In the minute 71, In Fort Lauderdale Houston drive forward through Ariel Lassiter. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Houston are coming forward and Memo Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, Miami have a goal kick.
Free kick Miami.
Goal kick for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 74, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Lewis Morgan with Victor Ulloa.
In the minute 77, Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Houston's half?
Houston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Niko Hansen is replacing Ariel Lassiter for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Houston have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Diego Alonso is making the team's second substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Ben Sweat replacing Brek Shea.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Houston at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
The away team have replaced Memo Rodriguez with Sam Junqua. This is the second substitution made today by Tab Ramos.
Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a third substitution, with Jay Chapman replacing Blaise Matuidi.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Miami.
In the minute 86, Houston are coming forward and Darwin Ceren gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
Throw-in for Houston in their own half.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Houston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Houston.
In the minute 89, Miami have a goal kick.
Drew Fischer will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Houston in the half of Miami.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a fourth substitution, with Julian Carranza replacing Matias Pellegrini.
Miami make their fifth substitution with Robbie Robinson replacing Gonzalo Higuain.
